title: The Unborn Realm
description: Resuming eight months after the events of book 3, The Haunts & the Hackles.The world is an apocalyptic mess. Dark unborn gods lie stunted in earthy wombs beneath their Haunt Trees. They strive to exterminate humankind, and as autumn turns to winter, it becomes more obvious than ever that they are succeeding. With each passing season, civilization unravels a little more.Medo Tatterwing suspects the High King, Lord Tresdayle, is connected to these unborn gods, but strives to unravel the riddle of how and why before its too late and humankind reaches its end.
author: M.M. Stauffer
